pr_title: Rename the MicroProfile Metric Bundles to use the `io.openliberty.*` and `io.openliberty.*.internal.*` convention.

timeline.bodyText: This doesn't look right.  Rename from com.ibm.ws.microprofile.metrics.3.0.monitor to io.openliberty.microprofile.metrics.internal.cdi.3.0?
timeline.author: fmhwong

timeline.bodyText: Not sure this is a git problem or the file is wrongly renamed.
timeline.author: fmhwong

replies.bodyText:
Right, should be a git issue.
Projects were copied/duplicated then renamed.
Then the original com.ibm.* projects were deleted at last.
replies.author: Channyboy

timeline.author: fmhwong
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,22 +1,22 @@
 -include= ~${workspace}/cnf/resources/bnd/feature.props
-symbolicName=com.ibm.websphere.appserver.mpMetrics-3.0
+symbolicName=io.openliberty.mpMetrics-3.0
 visibility=public
 singleton=true
 IBM-API-Package: org.eclipse.microprofile.metrics.annotation;  type="stable", \
  org.eclipse.microprofile.metrics; type="stable"
 IBM-ShortName: mpMetrics-3.0
 Subsystem-Name: MicroProfile Metrics 3.0
--features=com.ibm.websphere.appserver.org.eclipse.microprofile.metrics-3.0, \
+-features=io.openliberty.org.eclipse.microprofile.metrics-3.0, \
  com.ibm.websphere.appserver.cdi-2.0; ibm.tolerates:=1.2,\
  com.ibm.websphere.appserver.javax.annotation-1.3; ibm.tolerates:=1.2, \
  com.ibm.websphere.appserver.restHandler-1.0, \
  com.ibm.websphere.appserver.monitor-1.0, \
  com.ibm.websphere.appserver.servlet-4.0; ibm.tolerates:=3.1,\
  com.ibm.websphere.appserver.mpConfig-1.4; ibm.tolerates:=1.3

timeline.message:
Rename MP Metrics 3.0 bundles and projects to use the io.openliberty
naming pattern

Rename MP Metrics 3.0 bundles and projects to use the io.openliberty
naming pattern
